issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I am able to integrate some basic Swift code into Hyperloop and it's working well.

Now my issue is, I want to integrate a custom code written in Swift. It's just 4 swift files which I need to integrate using Hyperloop. It would be good if you guide me on how to integrate custom swift code and use the same with Hyperloop enabled Titanium Classci project.
fields.summary: Hyperloop: Unable to integrate Swift source code for Hyperloop project

comments.body: Hello, Please follow the guide in here: http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/iOS_Hyperloop_Programming_Guide-section-src-46253491_iOSHyperloopProgrammingGuide-UsingSwift. You can import third-party libraries written in Swift. Any *.swift files found in your src directories will automatically be compiled and available to use in your JavaScript just like Objective-C APIs. Thanks.
